text:
Police have nabbed a youth carrying sandalwood, weighing about 18 kg, near

Tenkasi. When the

police were conducting vehicle check near Aayikudi on Tuesday,

they intercepted a bike-laden youth on suspicion. As the police checked his bag, they found that the youth was carrying sandalwood, weighing about 18 kg. The police handed over the youth to the Forest Department personnel along with sandalwood for further investigation.
title: Youth with sandalwood held
